pathAssistantSteps.info:
Make sure to do a thorough needs analysis! You should enter the Carriers that you are quoting or enter what information you are waiting for from the Prospect in the Next Step field.

If this is a Worker's Comp Opportunity, be sure to navigate to the Prospect Client Tab (to the right of the Activity tab on the Opportunity) and update the Work Comp Renewal Date field!
Congratulations! You have a new Opportunity! You will need to make contact with the Prospect ASAP and advance this Opportunity or No Sale/Disqualify it within 5-10 days.

A Status of Plan is only used for Future Renewals. When selecting Plan, you are required to enter the Renewal Date in the Renewal Date field. The Renewal Date cannot be more than 18 months in the future. The Renewal Date and the Run-Effective Date should match! As an optional best practice: create a task with a Due Date that is 4-6 weeks prior to the renewal date.


Future Renewal Job Aid

Quote review is complete. Ask for the Sale! You are required to enter the Primary Competition and enter revenue information in Manage Products. DocuSign should be sent to the client at this stage. Next Step field should contain the Carrier you are presenting and the effective date of the quote.

If this is a Worker's Comp Opportunity, be sure to navigate to the Prospect Client Tab (to the right of the Activity tab on the Opportunity) and update the Work Comp Renewal Date field!


ACORD Job Aid
Congratulations! You have a new Opportunity! Be sure to Approve or Reject. Upon approval be sure to make contact with the Prospect and advance this Opportunity or No Sale/Disqualify it.
An Opportunity at this status means that the Policy has been incepted and Premium has pulled on the Client within the correct Run-Effective Fiscal Period.

Congratulations on your Sale! Well done! Your paperwork has been submitted for processing when your Opportunity is saved at this status. Next Step field should be updated to reflect the Submitted Date, Effective Date of Policy, and expected payroll check date.

The Prospect has committed to moving forward. Set a specific date to receive completed paperwork and enter that information in the Next Step field.

If this is a Worker's Comp Opportunity, be sure to navigate to the Prospect Client Tab (to the right of the Activity tab on the Opportunity) and update the Work Comp Renewal Date field!
